calculate_pixels_to_optimize¶

aplc_optimization.optimizer.calculate_pixels_to_optimize(last_optim, pupil_subsampled, edge_width_for_prior)[source]¶

Calculate the pixels to be used for the optimization for the adaptive algorithm. The exact selection of the pixels to be taken into account depends on future research.

last_optimField

The previously-optimized apodizer.

pupil_subsampledField

The telescope pupil subsampled to the same resolution as last_optim.

edge_pixels_for_priorint

The number of pixels along an edge.

Field

A boolean mask to indicate which pixels to take into account.
